20101223192601.000|20101223192603.000|CC1|           Great news!          
20101223192603.000|20101223192603.000|CC1|      For people with COPD,     
20101223192603.000|20101223192605.000|CC1|  including chronic bronchitis, 
20101223192605.000|20101223192607.000|CC1|       emphysema, or both,      
20101223192607.000|20101223192607.000|CC1|   ADVAIR helps significantly   
20101223192607.000|20101223192610.000|CC1|     improve lung function.     
20101223192610.000|20101223192611.000|CC1| While nothing can reverse COPD,
20101223192611.000|20101223192611.000|CC1|  ADVAIR is different from most 
20101223192611.000|20101223192614.000|CC1|     other COPD medications     
20101223192614.000|20101223192614.000|CC1|       because it contains      
20101223192614.000|20101223192617.000|CC1|    both an anti-inflammatory   
20101223192617.000|20101223192617.000|CC1|        and a long-acting       
20101223192617.000|20101223192619.000|CC1|         bronchodilator,        
20101223192619.000|20101223192619.000|CC1|        working together        
20101223192619.000|20101223192621.000|CC1|   to help you breathe better.  
20101223192621.000|20101223192621.000|CC1|ADVAIR won't replace fast-acting
20101223192621.000|20101223192624.000|CC1|  inhalers for sudden symptoms  
20101223192624.000|20101223192624.000|CC1|        and should not be       
20101223192624.000|20101223192626.000|CC1|   used more than twice a day.  
20101223192626.000|20101223192628.000|CC1| People with COPD taking ADVAIR 
20101223192628.000|20101223192628.000|CC1|    may have a higher chance    
20101223192628.000|20101223192630.000|CC1|          of pneumonia.         
20101223192630.000|20101223192630.000|CC1|       ADVAIR may increase      
20101223192630.000|20101223192632.000|CC1|    your risk of osteoporosis   
20101223192632.000|20101223192634.000|CC1|     and some eye problems.     
20101223192634.000|20101223192634.000|CC1|        Tell your doctor        
20101223192634.000|20101223192635.000|CC1|  if you have a heart condition 
20101223192635.000|20101223192635.000|CC1|     or high blood pressure     
20101223192635.000|20101223192638.000|CC1|      before taking ADVAIR.
